data: Heterogeneous graph learning based on earnings call data
Two-mechanism approach combining spatial relationships with stock dynamics
Modeling dynamic relationships through information entropy
Multi-relational diffusion process with parallel retention
Stable superiority on NASDAQ, NYSE, Shanghai (2016-2023)
Two-stage noise reduction framework with a locally-oriented attention mechanism
Iterative label refinement for noise reduction
Accuracy: 59.1% Improved win/loss ratio in volatile markets
Learnable sentiment aggregation optimized for forecasting
Self-reflective LLM framework for autonomous learning
Superior performance both in forecasting and as explanations
